With my first my water broke at 39 weeks and I got induced at 9pm on a Friday had my baby the next day at 6:47 Saturday wasn't so bad cause I wasn't looking at the watch cause I had no time for that I was in too much pain
I'm 40+1 day. I'm getting induced due to having gestational diabetes.
So ur water broke and they still induced u?
I delivered 5 hours after being induced with my first which was a blessing that I dilated quickly as they were getting me ready for an emergency c-section.

My first induction was only 7 ish hours I was also 10 days overdue. My second one I was 10 early and was induced due to low fluid and they started me in the morning nothing that evening and they stopped the pitocin so I could sleep than started again the next morning and than it was that evening I had her. Blessings and I hope everything goes well. I'm going in to be induced Thursday.

With my last induction, I didn't get close contractions until I moved to another position. My nurses had me to get in a "doggy style" position, then after a while my contractions started to come harder and closer

question: So I've been in the hospital since yesterday at 7am. Got induced. And still no baby girl yet. How long did it take u after you got induced?
